00192 inline bool
00193 Vehicle::isAllowed(uint32 connRestriction,
00194                    uint32 nodeRestriction) const
00195 {
00196    // Check the connection. One means we can get through.
00197    if ( m_vehicleMask & connRestriction ) {
00198       // Check the node. nodeRestriction = MAX_UINT32 means all is allowed
00199       return ( m_nodeRestriction == nodeRestriction )
00200          || ( m_nodeRestriction == Vehicle::allowAllNodeRestrictions );
00201    } else {
00202       return false;
00203    }
00204 }
